title: Landing Page Components
summary: The Shipixen boilerplate comes with custom-made presentational components that you can use to build your own landing page.

toc.value: All landing page components in the library

structuredData.headline: Landing Page Components
structuredData.description: The Shipixen boilerplate comes with custom-made presentational components that you can use to build your own landing page.
